extendedInfo.description: Introducing  "The  Personal  Empowerment  Package"  -  A  Collection  of  Powerful  Audio  Programs  to  Enhance  Your  Life! Brought  to  you  by  Arash  Shahangian,  MFT,  Mahastee  Mehdizadeh, MFT, known as "Stop-Sabotaging  Experts",  and  Leigh  Spusta,  C.Ht., internationally recognized Brainwave entrainment audio expert. Produced  by  professional  hypnotherapists  and  brainwave  specialists  -  combining  advanced  hypnotic  language,  NLP  techniques,  and  cutting  edge  brainwave  entrainment  /  hypnotic  soundscapes. In  today's  world,  it  is  far  too  easy  to  get  bogged  down,  stressed  out,  and  just  not  feeling  good  enough  about  our  current  circumstances.  That  is  why  this  package  has  been  assembled  -  to  give  you  an  effortless  way  to  :  Build  Confidence  and  Self-Esteem,  Attract  and  Create  Success  and  Abundance,  and  Making  "Feeling  Good"  a  normal  part  of  your  everyday  life. This  package  includes  5  potent  audio  programs  -  1.  Feeling  Good  -  Single  Voice  version 2.  Feeling  Good  -  Multi  Voice  version 3.  Building  Self-Esteem 4.  Reclaiming  Abundance 5.  Your  Natural  Abundance These  audio  programs  have  been  finely  crafted  using  advanced  hypnotic  language  and  NLP  techniques  that  will  effortlessly  guide  the  listener  into  a  deeply  comfortable  state  of  mind  where  the  subconscious  is  accessed  and  our  "life  script"  can  be  "re-written"  for  positive  changes.  Added  to  this  already  potent  formula  is  the  pristine  PsimatiXâ¢  audio  soundscapes  that  guide  the  listener  into  the  deepest  relaxation  and  positive  receptivity  using  brainwave  entrainment  rhythms  that  target  both  alpha  and  theta  cycles  in  the  brain,  beneficial  for  the  positive  changes  in  mind,  body,  and  emotions  to  unfold. Each  program  is  approximately  20  minutes  and  should  be  listened  to  at  a  time  when  you  won't  be  disturbed.  Headphones  or  earbuds  are  highly  recommended  due  to  the  advanced  nature  of  the  recordings.  Do  not  drive  while  listening  to  these  recordings. This app streams via 3G or wifi connection. Arash  Shahangian  and  Mahastee  Mehdizadeh  are  Licensed  Marriage  and  Family  Therapists/Clinical  Hypnotherapists.  They  are  the  "Stop-Sabotaging  Experts",  helping  people  overcome  fears  and  self  sabotaging  behaviors  so  you  can  have  the  life  you  want  successfully.  Leigh  Spusta  is  a  behavioral  scientist,  hypnotherapist,  and  Certified  Therapeutic  Imagery  Facilitator  specializing  in  the  use  of  sound  frequencies  to  produce  deep,  relaxing  trance  states.  Leigh  is  the  developer  of  the  proprietary  PsimatiXâ¢  therapeutic  approaches  and  technologies.Brainwave Entrainment / Binaural Beats / Isochronic Tones / Monaural Beats / Vibro-acoustics / Hemispheric Synchronization / Alpha State / Theta State / Delta State / Relaxation / Hypnosis / Hypnotic Music / Meditation / Stress Reduction / Tension Release / Chakra Alignment - Attunement - Balancing / Harmony / Schumann Resonance / Frequency / Mind Audio / Trance / Healing / Therapy
